name: Beenie Man
description: '''Moses Anthony Davis''' [[Order of Distinction|OD]] (born 22 August 1973), professionally known as '''Beenie Man''' aka '''King of Dancehall''', is a Jamaican [[dancehall]] DJ. His awards include DJ of the Year Award eight years in a row. His twelfth studio album ''[[Art and Life]]'' received a [[Grammy Award]] in 2001.
